name: Ilmu Politik
description:
My tribute and interpretation for a song called ‘ Ilmu Politik ‘ ( Merah Pt.1 ) from Jakarta’s IndieRock Unit ‘ Efek Rumah Kaca ‘. 
Taken from Sinestesia Album ( 2015 ) Track number 1.

“Merah” is more directed to social and political problems in Indonesia such as corruption, leadership, and policy determination, which in practice this political activity contains many violations and manipulations in its implementation. A politics can indeed make a change for the better if it is carried out by people who are competent or care about the people they lead. But politics can also be a sharp weapon to kill people who should be protected and given their human rights. Phenomena like this have become the anxiety of Efek Rumah Kaca and become the background for a song called " Merah" which it’s very straightforward and poetic song lyrics.

Find and listen to their songs here : https://open.spotify.com/track/1gapJiMx5ZOmFB0mNdIhSQ

Ilmu Politik / JPEG /  1620x2160 / 300 / 9MB
